page.title: 12THE HOUSEHOLD
page.content: In our survey,we found that most of the people had lived in the area for less than 30 years.Of these,most had moved in less than 20 years ago. The most popular item of household equipment was a television set,and almost every house had a telephone. The next most popular items were washing machines and fridges. Next came freezers. Dishwashers,micro-wave cookers,video recorders,tumble driers and computers were found mainly in the houses of younger people,so they were less common. Most families had at least one car. There are no big shops in the area so most people do their shopping for food and clothes in the towns,especi- ally Burton on Trent.
